name: Get Me Bodied
content: Mission four Drop the vintage Rolls
A little sweat aint never hurt nobody
While ya'll standin on the wall
I'm the one tonight gettin bodied
I wanna let it out tonight
Skip to the front of the line
Mission seven Got make my rounds
I aint worried doing me tonight
A little sweat aint never hurt nobody
While ya'll standin on the wall
I'm the one tonight gettin bodied
I wanna let it out tonight
I wanna let it out tonight
That means come closer to me
While we grind to the beat

While we grind to the beat
And your body touchin my body

I swing my hair and kick off my shoes
Come here boy, let me work on you
